data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Qitaihe, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 38,416 believers in Qitaihe, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 38,416 believers in the county of Qitaihe to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.section_summary: On average, 37 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Qitaihe, Heilongjiang, China.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Qitaihe, Heilongjiang, China.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 506,400 citizens of the the county of Qitaihe.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Kyakala people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Kyakala people know you.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Qitaihe
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the county of Qitaihe to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.section_summary:
the county of Qitaihe, Heilongjiang, China has a population of 506,400.

We estimate Qitaihe has 38,416 people who might know Jesus, 8,181 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 459,803 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Qitaihe
location.people_groups_list: Tatar, Khakass, Olot, Oroqen, Saman, Japanese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tatar, Khakass (800), Olot (3,200), Oroqen (11,000), Saman (3,300), Japanese (7,000)
